title: potential bug?
body: screen blacks out, can’t alt tab or alt f4 it’s probably my computer but i now have a 20 minute lpq please help does anyone have tips for how to outlast the wait

replies.body:
Could be a bad overlay interaction (Discord, Overwolf, Nvidia etc. so first I'd try turning anything like that off.

Second suggestion would be to try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work you could try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
